title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1001.6 - Maintenance of certain records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1001.6 - Maintenance of certain records

State Regulations

The authority shall maintain and make available for public
inspection and copying, in accordance with this Part: (a) a record of the final vote of each member
of the authority in every authority proceeding in which the member
votes; (b) a record setting forth
the name, public office address, title and salary of every officer and employee
of the authority; and
(c) a
reasonably detailed list, by subject matter, of all records in the possession
of the authority, whether or not available under the Freedom of Information

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1001.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
